author: epugh
msg: Bug fix for anon user.  I am now able to use this in my .VM code:
And the data is being pulled using Hibernate from a live database.  All using
Turbine 2.3 RC 1 and Fulcrum-Security and the Turbine adapter.

author: epugh
msg: Refactored all code to use Object as the ID.  Whew..
Also discovered that the turbine adapters would all need to convert from/to integers
from unknown objects.  So using an IntegerConverter from beanutils.  Allows you
to convert from Long, Integer, Number etc and String if the String is a number, like "86".
